attributes.action: Change the Big Lunch Day to the 18th July 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition to change the National Big Lunch day to the 18th July instead of the 19th July!

As too many people will be hung over from the Sunday and end up taking days off work.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
